title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid email registered in the system.
Enter the correct password associated with the email.
Click the login button.
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an unregistered or invalid email.
Enter an incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is denied and an error message indicating invalid credentials is shown.

title: Access Denied to Protected Routes without Authentication
description: Verify that unauthenticated users cannot access protected application routes and are redirected to login.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to a protected route (e.g., Dashboard).
Verify that the system redirects to the login page.

title: Display Real-time Sales Overview on Dashboard
description: Verify that the dashboard displays real-time sales data with summary cards, time filters, sales charts, and recent transactions correctly.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Dashboard view.
Check that the summary cards show total sales, orders, transfer amount, and COD amount with correct updated values.
Apply each time filter: today, last 7 days, last 30 days, this month, last month, and select a custom month.
Ensure sales charts update reflecting the applied time filter with correct data visualization.
Verify that the list of recent 10 transactions matches the filtered sales data and shows correct details.

title: Create Transfer Sales Entry with Valid Data
description: Verify that a transfer sale can be added successfully through the form with valid inputs including auto-generated order number and customer autocomplete.

steps.description: Navigate to Transfer Sales Entry page.
Fill in the date/time picker with a valid date and time.
Verify that the order number is automatically generated in correct format TRF-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS.
Enter a partial customer name and select from autocomplete suggestions.
Fill in the amount input with a valid positive number.
Optionally upload a valid slip URL.
Submit the form.
Verify transfer record is saved and listed among the 10 most recent transfer records with correct details.

title: Transfer Sales Entry Validation Checks
description: Verify form validations on Transfer Sales Entry form including required fields and input formats.

steps.description: Navigate to Transfer Sales Entry page.
Attempt to submit the form with empty required fields: date/time, customer name, or amount.
Check that validation error messages are displayed for missing inputs.
Input invalid amount values such as negative numbers or non-numeric characters.
Check that amount field validation prevents submission and shows appropriate errors.

title: Import COD Excel Files Successfully
description: Verify that users can drag-and-drop valid Excel files for COD import, and the system parses, validates, previews data accurately before saving.

steps.description: Navigate to the Import COD feature page.
Drag and drop multiple valid .xlsx or .xls files into the import area.
Check that files are parsed correctly with no errors.
Verify that all data rows are validated checking date format, customer names presence, and amount correctness.
Validate preview screen displays total files processed, total items and aggregated total amount.
Confirm the import action to save data.
Verify COD data is successfully saved in Firebase and reflects in the All Sales Management and dashboard.

title: COD Import Validation Error Handling
description: Verify system behavior when COD Excel files contain invalid data such as malformed dates, missing fields, or invalid amounts.

steps.description: Navigate to Import COD feature page.
Drag and drop Excel files containing rows with invalid dates, missing customer names, or negative amounts.
Verify validation catches errors and highlights problematic rows.
Check that user is prevented from confirming save until errors are corrected or invalid rows removed.

title: All Sales Management - Filter and Pagination
description: Verify the advanced filtering options and pagination work correctly in the All Sales Management view.

steps.description: Navigate to All Sales Management page.
Apply the 'All' filter and verify that all sales records are listed.
Apply custom date range filter and verify the sales list updates correctly to the date range.
Apply select month filter and verify displayed records match the month.
Check summary cards update accordingly with total sales and payment breakdown.
Navigate through available pagination controls if record count exceeds page size.
Verify sales records displayed correspond to the correct pages.

title: Delete a Sales Record from All Sales View
description: Verify that a sales record can be deleted from the All Sales Management view with confirmation and that data updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to All Sales Management page.
Select a sales record and click the delete action.
Verify the system prompts for user confirmation before deletion.
Confirm the deletion.
Check that the sales record is removed from the list and underlying database.
Verify that summary cards and charts update to reflect the deletion.

title: Export Sales Data to Excel
description: Verify the export functionality generates an accurate and correctly formatted Excel file from filtered sales data.

steps.description: Navigate to All Sales Management page.
Apply filters to sales data.
Click the export to Excel button.
Verify an Excel file is downloaded.
Open the Excel file and confirm that all sales records match filtered data with proper formatting and columns.

title: Customer Management - Add New Customer
description: Verify that users can add a new customer with valid data using the modal form and that the customer list updates in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to Customers Management page.
Click to open modal for adding new customer.
Input valid customer data including name (required), phone number, address, and notes.
Submit the form.
Verify the new customer appears in the customer list instantly.
Verify that data is persisted in Firebase Firestore.

title: Customer Management - Edit Existing Customer
description: Verify that user can edit an existing customer's details via modal form and updates reflect correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Customers Management page.
Select an existing customer and open the edit modal form.
Modify customer details including optional fields.
Submit the form.
Verify the edited details are updated in the list and saved in the database.

title: Customer Management - Delete Customer
description: Verify that a customer can be deleted with confirmation and that the list and database update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Customers Management page.
Select a customer to delete and initiate delete action.
Verify confirmation prompt appears.
Confirm deletion.
Check customer is removed from the customer list and database.

title: Customer Management - Real-time Search
description: Verify that the search input filters the customer list in real-time based on name matches.

steps.description: Navigate to Customers Management page.
Type partial or full customer names in search input.
Verify the list filters dynamically showing only matching customers.
Clear the search input.
Verify the full customer list is restored.

title: View Customer Detail with Purchase Statistics and History
description: Verify that detailed customer profile displays personal info, purchase stats including total orders, amount, latest order, and complete purchase history table correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a customer's detail page.
Check customer information fields are displayed correctly.
Verify purchase statistics such as total orders, total purchase amount, and latest order are accurate.
Verify that purchase history table lists all purchases with date, order number, type, and amount.

title: Responsive Design on Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile
description: Verify the application layout adapts correctly and maintains usability across desktop, tablet, and mobile breakpoints.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop screen size.
Verify sidebar is visible and navigation works.
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions.
Verify layout adjusts properly and navigation remains accessible.
Resize viewport to mobile screen size.
Verify desktop sidebar is replaced by bottom navigation.
Verify logout and app version are accessible in mobile navigation.

title: Logout Functionality and Session Termination
description: Verify that clicking logout ends user session, clears authentication state, and redirects to login page.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to any protected page.
Click the logout button from main navigation.
Verify user is signed out and redirected to login page.
Try accessing protected routes after logout.
Verify access is denied and redirect to login page occurs.

title: Pull-to-Refresh Component on Mobile Devices
description: Verify that the pull-to-refresh component triggers manual data refresh on supported mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the app on a mobile device or emulator.
Perform a pull-down gesture on any list view (e.g., Dashboard sales list).
Verify manual refresh is initiated, loading indicator is shown, and sales data updates upon completion.

title: Sales Chart Component Data Visualization Accuracy
description: Verify that the sales chart component accurately displays stacked bar charts for Transfer and COD amounts with correct data labels.

steps.description: Navigate to Dashboard with sample sales data available.
Verify chart bars correspond to Transfer and COD amounts per selected time period.
Verify stacked bar labels display accurate summed amounts.
Change time range filters.
Verify chart updates accordingly reflecting new filtered data.
